affiliate.title: Are you ready to
affiliate.content: Discover a world of possibilities with Bitunix's Affiliate Program. We've tailored our offerings to bring you unmatched benefits that align with your success. Here's what's in store when you become a part of our esteemed Affiliate Program.
affiliate.content2: Introducing the Bitunix Exclusive Affiliate Program. Your ticket to generous commissions and unbeatable rewards.
affiliate.content3: Unlock the potential of your network and maximize your earnings like never before. Every trade, every move you make is an opportunity to earn.
affiliate.title6: Are you ready to tap into a world of lucrative opportunities?
affiliate.content4: Seize the chance to partner with Bitunix,
affiliate.content5: and transform your network into a source of substantial
affiliate.title7: Who We're Eager to Partner With
affiliate.title8: Contact us for your personal promo offer!
affiliate.textContent: Enjoy commissions of up to 70%, setting new industry standards.
affiliate.textContent2: Gain commission from every trade your referrals execute.
affiliate.textContent3: The commission period for each referral is permanent, ensuring consistent income.
affiliate.textContent4: Daily rebates are credited to users. Rebates time: 2:00am(UTC)
affiliate.textContent5: Share your referral link or QR code with friends, family, and followers.
affiliate.textContent6: Earn up to a whopping 70% commission from the trades made by those you referred to.
affiliate.textContent7: If you specialize in generating high-quality online traffic, especially on platforms like Facebook, Google Ads, and various  networks, you're the catalyst we need to amplify our reach.
affiliate.textContent8: Whether your influence thrives on YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TradingView, Telegram channels, or you're a dedicated streamer, your dynamic presence can be a game-changer for Bitunix.
affiliate.textContent9: If you're actively engaged in crypto trading education or trading in other assets, your expertise is a seamless match with Bitunix's commitment to education and growth.
affiliate.textContent10: If you're a regional influencer, a trading-focused blogger, a media website owner, a thought leader, or even an insightful editor, you hold the potential to amplify our message and extend our impact.
affiliate.textContent11: If you understand the power of referrals and want to convert your influence into substantial earnings, Bitunix's Refer and Earn program opens doors to unmatched rewards.
affiliate.textContent12: Regardless of your background, if you possess the determination to make an impact, Bitunix is excited to have you on board. Each partnership is a unique opportunity to thrive in the crypto realm.
affiliate.name: name
affiliate.tip3: Name length should be 2 to 20 characters
affiliate.tip5: Please enter a valid email address
affiliate.prompt: The message has been received, our Business Development will contact you shortly.
